select sel_no as selNo, sel_id as selId, sel_pw as selPw, sel_name as selName, sel_tel as selTel, sel_addr as selAddr, sel_enroll as selEnroll from seller_db where sel_id = #{selId}

select c1.cls_no as classNo, c1.cls_name as className, c1.sel_no as selNo, c1.cls_Det as classDetail, c1.cls_price as classPrice, c1.class_person as classPerson, c1.class_enroll as classEnroll, c1.classstarttime as classStartTime, c1.status, c1.class_date as classDate , NVL(sum(c2.class_person),0) as classNow
from class_db c1 LEFT JOIN CLASS_LIST_DB c2 on cls_class_no=#{classNo} where cls_no=#{classNo} group by c1.cls_no , c1.cls_name, c1.sel_no, c1.cls_det, c1.cls_price, c1.class_enroll, c1.classstarttime,c1.status,c1.class_person,c1.class_date

select c.cls_no as classNo, c.cls_name as className, c.sel_no as selNo, c.cls_det as classDetail, c.cls_price as classPrice, c.class_enroll as classEnroll, c.classstarttime as classStartTime, c.status as status,c.class_person as classPerson,c.class_date as classDate,sum(cl.class_person) as classNow from class_db c left join class_list_db cl on(cl.cls_class_no = c.cls_no) group by c.cls_no , c.cls_name, c.sel_no, c.cls_det, c.cls_price, c.class_enroll, c.classstarttime,c.status,c.class_person,c.class_date

select * from (select rownum as rnum, g.* from ( select gds_no as gdsNo, gds_name as gdsName, gds_pri as gdsPri, gds_bcnt as gdsBcnt, sel_no as selNo, status, goods_date as goodsDate, goods_type as goodsType from goods_db order by 1 desc)g) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

update seller_db set sel_name=#{selName}, sel_pw=#{selPw}, sel_tel=#{selTel}, sel_addr=#{selAddr} where sel_no=#{selNo}
